Seizure ?--- Pulmonary hypertension ?:;;;
Seizure ?--- Trouble speaking (Aphasia / Dysphasia) ?:;;;
Sex at birth:--- ACE inhibitor or Angiotensin Receptor Blocker?:;;;
Sex at birth:--- Anticoagulants?:;;;
Sex at birth:--- Coronary artery disease ?:;;;
Sex at birth:--- Diarrhea ?:;;;
Sex at birth:--- Height in m::;;;
Sex at birth:--- If a screening test for SARS-CoV-2 by PCR was performed, what is the most severe severity level (according to WHO) achieved?:;;;
Sex at birth:--- Long Covid:;;;
Sex at birth:--- Nausea / vomiting ?:;;;
Sex at birth:--- Psychiatric disease?:;;;
Sex at birth:--- Runny nose (Rhinorrhea) ?:;;;
Skin rash ?--- Anticoagulants?:;;;
Skin rash ?--- Long Covid:;;;
Skin rash ?--- Loss of appetite ?:;;;
Skin rash ?--- Trouble speaking (Aphasia / Dysphasia) ?:;;;
Smoking status:--- Is the participant employed as a Healthcare Worker?  :;;;
Smoking status:--- Loss of appetite ?:;;;
Smoking status:--- Weight in kg::;;;
Systemic corticosteroid?--- Cough ?:;;;
Systemic corticosteroid?--- Height in m::;;;
Systemic corticosteroid?--- Long Covid:;;;
Systemic corticosteroid?--- Wheezing or stridor ?:;;;
Trouble speaking (Aphasia / Dysphasia) ?--- Arterial Hypertension ?:;;;
Trouble speaking (Aphasia / Dysphasia) ?--- COPD (emphysema, chronic bronchitis) ?:;;;
Trouble speaking (Aphasia / Dysphasia) ?--- Extremity weakness or numbness ?:;;;
Trouble speaking (Aphasia / Dysphasia) ?--- HGO or insulin?:;;;
Trouble speaking (Aphasia / Dysphasia) ?--- Heart failure ?:;;;
Trouble speaking (Aphasia / Dysphasia) ?--- Long Covid:;;;
Weight in kg:--- Age au recrutement::;;;
Weight in kg:--- Shortness of breath (Dyspnea) ?:;;;
Wheezing or stridor ?--- Height in m::;;;
Wheezing or stridor ?--- Long Covid:;;;
